overview: For every boob man who ever sailed on a Boob Cruise and every boob man who dreamt about being on one, this DVD that puts you in the middle of the action on five memorable voyages. Your shipmates are the greatest busty babes ever, from Linsey Dawn McKenzie to SaRenna Lee, Danni Ashe, Angelique, Tawny Peaks, Lorna Morgan, Busty Dusty, Chloe Vevrier, Dawn Stone and so many more! By day, they heated up the Caribbean's spectacular beaches. At night, they danced and partied into the wee hours. They wished you were there...and now you can be!
title: Best of Boob Cruise
